name: GameDev life
description:
This is a game where you have to be a game dev. What you do is make games to get money and use the money to eat and make more games. For the people that read the description, i will tell you the secrets in a little bit. I think it's only fair. Anyway you can choose you gender, your company name, and you game names. There will be a button that you can press to look at all the games you have made. It takes time to create, download the file, and then publish the game that you made. If your sleep goes down more than 50% you won't be able to make a game if you aren't already.

Now for the secrets:

If you make you company name MINECRAFT you will get a minecraft themed carpet and bed.

If you make your company name ROBLOX you will get a roblox themed carpet and bed.

Enjoy the game and the secrets!
